::SnowCat:;

She took a step closer. "Come on out. I will not harm you unless you 
give reason for me to do so.  Please step out of the trees and make 
yourself known."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rattrap:
> 
> 
> The flier had gone down. That was a plus. But another one of the 
bots 
> saw him, and now arming himself. Rattrap spun to the side and 
planted 
> his back behind a tree. He withdrew his gun and held it to the 
front 
> of his chest. He listened and turned his head, watching Ramulus 
from 
> the corner of his optics. 
> 
> What am I doing? he asked himself.
